metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6728 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The ApiBase::getWatchlistUser function in MediaWiki before 1.23.10, 1.24.xbefore 1.24.3, and 1.25.x before 1.25.2 does not perform token comparisonin constant time, which allows remote attackers to guess the watchlisttoken and bypass CSRF protection via a timing attack.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
